dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1960
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Stops to see friends in Vermont on her way to a retreat in Montreal. Mentions books and machines for village economics and home industries. Recounts visiting folks on her last trip west and a miracle of an infant with polio. She delights in everyone's practice of the works of mercy.
